sp_instance.title: contacts-table
sp_instance.widget_parameters: { "table": "sys_user", "static_query": "active=true", "show_new_record_button": "true", "default_fields": "[{ \"label\": \"User ID\", \"name\": \"user_name\" }, { \"label\": \"First name\", \"name\": \"first_name\" }, { \"label\": \"Last name\", \"name\": \"last_name\" }, { \"label\": \"Email\", \"name\": \"email\" }, { \"label\": \"Business Phone\", \"name\": \"phone\" }, { \"label\": \"Title\", \"name\": \"title\" }]", "page_title": "Contacts", "order_by": "user_name", "order_direction": "ASC", "limit": "10", "fields_preference_name": "scm_portal.contacts.fields", "order_by_preference_name": "scm_portal.contacts.order_by", "order_direction_preference_name": "scm_portal.contacts.order_direction", "limit_preference_name": "scm_portal.contacts.limit", "detail_view_page": "contact_details", "all_fields_available": "[{ \"label\": \"User ID\", \"name\": \"user_name\" }, { \"label\": \"First name\", \"name\": \"first_name\" }, { \"label\": \"Last name\", \"name\": \"last_name\" }, { \"label\": \"Email\", \"name\": \"email\" }, { \"label\": \"Business Phone\", \"name\": \"phone\" }, { \"label\": \"Title\", \"name\": \"title\" }, { \"label\": \"Department\", \"name\": \"department\" }, { \"label\": \"Company\", \"name\": \"companyÂ¨\" }]", "enable_filters": "true", "filter_fields": "[{ \"field\": \"department\", \"label\": \"Department\", \"type\": \"reference\", \"referenceTable\": \"cmn_department\", \"displayFields\": \"name;id\", \"displayField\": \"name\", \"searchFields\": \"name;id\", \"referenceQualifier\": \"nameISNOTEMPTY^idISNOTEMPTY\", \"placeholder\": \"Select a department\", \"pageSize\": \"10\", \"minimumInputLength\": \"2\", \"orderBy\": \"name\", \"orderDirection\": \"desc\" }]" }
